mapper.sql: select sum(amount) income,repay_time time from (select amount,DATE_FORMAT(repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') repay_time from cl_borrow_repay_log ) t GROUP BY repay_time ORDER BY repay_time DESC

select sum(t.real_amount) expend,t.create_time time from (select b.real_amount,DATE_FORMAT(bp.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') create_time from cl_borrow_progress bp LEFT JOIN cl_borrow b on bp.borrow_id = b.id where bp.state = '30' ) t GROUP BY t.create_time ORDER BY create_time DESC
